title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 579.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 579.2 - Scope

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations apply to all operators of motor vehicles on college property, including faculty, staff, students, and visitors. Motor vehicle is defined in
section 125, New York State Vehicle and Traffic Law. (b) The private operation of snowmobiles, dirt bikes, and all-terrain vehicles on college-owned and controlled properties
is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
579.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
